title: Semantic Proactive Assistance for Households
info: 3-D Spatio-Temporal mapping with Hello-Robot-Stretch to understand and track dynamic indoor environments.

title: Deep-Learning-Driven Lettuce Analysis
info: Collected the largest hyperspectral lettuce dataset and trained vision-transformer models to predict nutrient content and growth.

title: Robotic Phenotyping for Small Scale Urban Farms
info: 3D Point-cloud processing and pose-estimation pipelines for accurate plant monitoring and robotic pollination.

title: Mass Estimation and Monitoring from 3D Point Clouds
info: A hybrid cable-driven robot for non-destructive 3D monitoring of hydroponic plants
